  • Processor: Core i5-7200U / 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: --
